body.p: Local law governing the operations of co‑operatives, or the terms of the entity’s governing charter, prohibit an entity from redeeming members’ shares if, by redeeming them, it would reduce paid‑in capital from members’ shares below 75 per cent of the highest amount of paid‑in capital from members’ shares. The highest amount for a particular co‑operative is CU1,000,000. At the end of the reporting period the balance of paid‑in capital is CU900,000.
